Title: A custom 404 page in Blazor Web Apps
Description: Sometimes you want to have a custom 404 page - and since .NET 8 and "Blazor WebApps" the <NotFound> tag of the Router doesn't work anymore, so let's create a custom page for that.

Title: AI code suggestions sabotage software supply chain
GitHub - ariebovenberg/whenever: ⏰ Modern datetime library for Python
Description: ⏰ Modern datetime library for Python. Contribute to ariebovenberg/whenever development by creating an account on GitHub.
